description.value: Defines codes defined within the SDC implementation guide that are expected to migrate elsewhere in future releases

display.value: The Task is asking the owner to create a QuestionnaireResponse based on the Questionnaire identified in one of the task inputs
A canonical reference (possibly version-specific) to the Questionnaire to be completed
A reference to the QuestionnaireResponse resulting from the requested action
Identifies the base URL for FHIR servers to which the Questionnaire resulting from the Task should be POSTed
